languages.text: Кибернетически улучшенная птица, способная расширять разведспособности хозяина на поле боя. Встроенные Адептус Механикус технологии позволяют владельцу контролировать киберорла с помощью простых команд, сея страх на поле боя. Самый распространенный вид — двухголовые создания, напоминающие живую аквилу.

traits.locale_text: Кибернетически улучшенная птица, способная выслеживать и уничтожать врагов Империума на поле брани. Встроенные Адептус Механикус технологии помогают владельцу давать птице простые команды и управлять ей в бою. Самый распространенный вид этих кибербестий — двухголовые создания, напоминающие живую аквилу.

languages.text: A cybernetically enhanced bird capable of expanding its master's scouting abilities on the battlefield. Built-in Adeptus Mechanicus technologies allow the owner to control the cyber-eagle through simple commands, spreading fear across the front. The most common variant is a two-headed creature resembling a living Aquila.
languages.original_text: Кибернетически улучшенная птица, способная расширять разведспособности хозяина на поле боя. Встроенные Адептус Механикус технологии позволяют владельцу контролировать киберорла с помощью простых команд, сея страх на поле боя. Самый распространенный вид — двухголовые создания, напоминающие живую аквилу.

traits.locale_text: A cybernetically enhanced bird capable of expanding its master's scouting abilities on the battlefield. Built-in Adeptus Mechanicus technologies allow the owner to control the cyber-eagle through simple commands, spreading fear across the front. The most common variant is a two-headed creature resembling a living Aquila.

A cybernetically enhanced bird capable of expanding its master's scouting abilities on the battlefield. With the help of technologies implanted by members of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the owner can issue simple commands to the bird and sow fear in the enemy ranks. The most common variant is a two-headed creature resembling a living Aquila.

A cybernetically enhanced bird capable of expanding its master's scouting abilities on the battlefield. Built-in Adeptus Mechanicus technologies allow the owner to control the cyber-eagle through simple commands, spreading fear across the front. The most common variant is a two-headed creature resembling a living Aquila.

A cybernetically enhanced bird capable of expanding its master's scouting abilities on the battlefield. Built-in Adeptus Mechanicus technologies allow the owner to control the cyber-eagle through simple commands, spreading fear across the front. The most common variant is a two-headed creature resembling a living Aquila.

A cybernetically enhanced bird capable of expanding its master's scouting abilities on the battlefield. With the help of technologies implanted by members of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the owner can issue the eagle simple commands in order to sow fear in the enemy ranks. The most common variant is a two-headed creature resembling a living Aquila.

A cybernetically enhanced bird capable of expanding its master's scouting abilities on the battlefield. With the help of technologies implanted by members of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the owner can issue the eagle simple commands in order to sow fear in the enemy ranks. The most common variant is a two-headed creature resembling a living Aquila.

A cybernetically enhanced bird capable of expanding its master's scouting abilities on the battlefield. Built-in Adeptus Mechanicus technologies allow the owner to control the cyber-eagle through simple commands, spreading fear across the front. The most common variant is a two-headed creature resembling a living Aquila.

languages.text: Ein kybernetisch erweiterter Vogel, der die Aufklärungsfähigkeiten seines Meisters auf dem Schlachtfeld erweitert. Eigebaute Technologien des Adeptus Mechanicus erlauben dem Besitzer, den Cyber-Adler mittels einfacher Befehle zu kontrollieren, um an der Front Angst und Schrecken zu verbreiten. Die häufigste Variante ist eine zweiköpfige Kreatur, die einem lebendigen Aquila nachempfunden ist.
languages.original_text: A cybernetically enhanced bird capable of expanding its master's scouting abilities on the battlefield. Built-in Adeptus Mechanicus technologies allow the owner to control the cyber-eagle through simple commands, spreading fear across the front. The most common variant is a two-headed creature resembling a living Aquila.

traits.locale_text: Ein kybernetisch erweiterter Vogel, der die Aufklärungsfähigkeiten seines Meisters auf dem Schlachtfeld erweitert. Eigebaute Technologien des Adeptus Mechanicus erlauben dem Besitzer, den Cyber-Adler mittels einfacher Befehle zu kontrollieren, um an der Front Angst und Schrecken zu verbreiten. Die häufigste Variante ist eine zweiköpfige Kreatur, die einem lebendigen Aquila nachempfunden ist.

languages.text: Un oiseau doté d'augmentations cybernétiques qui lui permettent d'améliorer les capacités de reconnaissance de son maître sur le champ de bataille. Les technologies intégrées de l'Adeptus Mechanicus permettent au propriétaire du cyber-aigle de le contrôler à l'aide de commandes simples et de semer la terreur dans les rangs ennemis. Le modèle le plus courant est un aigle à deux têtes qui ressemble à un Aquila vivant.
languages.original_text: A cybernetically enhanced bird capable of expanding its master's scouting abilities on the battlefield. Built-in Adeptus Mechanicus technologies allow the owner to control the cyber-eagle through simple commands, spreading fear across the front. The most common variant is a two-headed creature resembling a living Aquila.

traits.locale_text: Un oiseau doté d'augmentations cybernétiques qui lui permettent d'améliorer les capacités de reconnaissance de son maître sur le champ de bataille. Les technologies intégrées de l'Adeptus Mechanicus permettent au propriétaire du cyber-aigle de le contrôler à l'aide de commandes simples et de semer la terreur dans les rangs ennemis. Le modèle le plus courant est un aigle à deux têtes qui ressemble à un Aquila vivant.

languages.text: 这只猎鹰由机械部件改造，可以强化主人在战场上的侦查能力。这种生化猎鹰装有机械修会的技术植入物，可以执行主人下达的简单命令，在前线的敌群之中散播恐惧。这种猎鹰最常见的形态拥有两颗头颅，类似于真正的双头鹰。
languages.original_text: A cybernetically enhanced bird capable of expanding its master's scouting abilities on the battlefield. Built-in Adeptus Mechanicus technologies allow the owner to control the cyber-eagle through simple commands, spreading fear across the front. The most common variant is a two-headed creature resembling a living Aquila.

traits.locale_text: 这只猎鹰由机械部件改造，可以强化主人在战场上的侦查能力。这种生化猎鹰装有机械修会的技术植入物，可以执行主人下达的简单命令，在前线的敌群之中散播恐惧。这种猎鹰最常见的形态拥有两颗头颅，类似于真正的双头鹰。

languages.text: Un pájaro con mejoras cibernéticas, capaz de extender las capacidades de exploración de su amo por el campo de batalla. La tecnología integrada del permite a su amo dar órdenes sencillas al águila para sembrar el terror en el frente. La variante más común es una criatura bicéfala, similar a un Aquila animada.
languages.original_text: A cybernetically enhanced bird capable of expanding its master's scouting abilities on the battlefield. Built-in Adeptus Mechanicus technologies allow the owner to control the cyber-eagle through simple commands, spreading fear across the front. The most common variant is a two-headed creature resembling a living Aquila.

traits.locale_text: Un pájaro con mejoras cibernéticas, capaz de extender las capacidades de exploración de su amo por el campo de batalla. La tecnología integrada del permite a su amo dar órdenes sencillas al águila para sembrar el terror en el frente. La variante más común es una criatura bicéfala, similar a un Aquila animada.

languages.text: サイバネティカに強化された鳥で、戦場で主人の偵察能力を拡張できる。帝国技術局のメンバーによって埋め込まれた技術の助けを借りて、所有者はこの鷲に簡単な指示を出し、敵陣に恐怖をまき散らすことができる。最も一般的な変種は、生きた双頭鷲に似た双頭の生物である。
languages.original_text: A cybernetically enhanced bird capable of expanding its master's scouting abilities on the battlefield. With the help of technologies implanted by members of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the owner can issue the eagle simple commands in order to sow fear in the enemy ranks. The most common variant is a two-headed creature resembling a living Aquila.

traits.locale_text: サイバネティカに強化された鳥で、戦場で主人の偵察能力を拡張できる。帝国技術局のメンバーによって埋め込まれた技術の助けを借りて、所有者はこの鷲に簡単な指示を出し、敵陣に恐怖をまき散らすことができる。最も一般的な変種は、生きた双頭鷲に似た双頭の生物である。

languages.text: Sahibinin çatışma alanındaki gözlem kabiliyetlerini artıran, sibernetik açıdan geliştirilmiş bir kuş. Bünyesinde barındırdığı Adeptus Mechanicus teknolojileri, sahibinin basit komutlarla siber kartalı kontrol ederek cepheye korku salmasını sağlar. En yaygın cinsi, Çift Başlı Kartal'ın vücut bulmuş hâlini andıran iki kafalı bir yaratıktır.
languages.original_text: A cybernetically enhanced bird capable of expanding its master's scouting abilities on the battlefield. Built-in Adeptus Mechanicus technologies allow the owner to control the cyber-eagle through simple commands, spreading fear across the front. The most common variant is a two-headed creature resembling a living Aquila.

Bünyesinde barındırdığı Adeptus Mechanicus teknolojileri, sahibinin basit komutlarla siber kartalı kontrol ederek cepheye korku salmasını sağlar. En yaygın cinsi, Çift Başlı Kartal'ın vücut bulmuş hâlini andıran iki kafalı bir yaratıktır.
